product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner is divided into four equal quadrants with soft gradient backgrounds in varying shades of pink. The top-left quadrant features a circular highlight element and includes three text layers: a bold brand title (`heading`), a stylized multi-line subheading (`subheading`), and a tagline (`tagline`) beneath it. The top-right quadrant has a centrally placed product image (`product_image`) of rose gold stud earrings, framed by gentle visual embellishments and dotted lines. The bottom-left quadrant displays a bullet-point product feature list (`description`), followed by the prominent price (`price`) and a "Shop Now" call-to-action (`cta`) placed over a colored button background (`cta_background`). The bottom-right quadrant includes a soft pink circular embellishment. Elegant swirls and subtle design lines enrich the background for added sophistication.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Rose Pink: `#FFF5F5`
- Light Blush Pink: `#FFE6E6`
- Warm Baby Pink: `#FFDBDB`
- Pastel Pink: `#FFD1D1`
- Blush Coral: `#FFCACA`
- Highlight Circle Pink: `#FFB6B6`
- Deep Rose Text: `#AD1457`
- Dark Raspberry Text: `#880E4F`
- Button Text White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings featuring a soft and feminine color palette, ideal for a luxurious and delicate advertisement banner. The dominant rose gold (#EFB7B7) forms the base structure, blending smoothly with a gentle pastel pink (#FAD4D4) accent on the floral buds. Clear, faceted stones contribute to a vibrant sparkle effect with reflections appearing near-white (#FFFFFF) and crystal blue hues (#E1EFFF). These colors are carefully balanced—rose gold offers warmth, while the crystal elements add brilliance and contrast. The colors are both blended (for harmony) and strategically highlighted (for sparkle), enhancing the allure and sophistication of the product.
